T02D3272:24b-1: shr'i dzambha la s'a dha nam /
T02D3272:24b-4: lhag ma ma lus pa'i phun sum tshogs pa sbyin
T02D3272:24b-5: par mdzad pa'i dpal dzambha la la phyag 'tshal lo
T02D3272:24b-6: // dang por re zhig dngos po rnams thams cad
T02D3272:24b-7: dang rang nyid kyi lus kyang stong pa nyid du
T02D3272:24b-9: de'i rjes thogs su thabs dang shes rab kyi rang
T02D3272:24b-10: bzhin du gyur pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor cung zad
T02D3272:24b-11: dmar ba ste de kho na nyid gnod sbyin gyi
T02D3272:24b-12: shing rta gru gsum yin zhing padma 'dab ma brgyad
T02D3272:24b-13: pa'i rdzing bu'o // de'i dbus su yi ge bam las nor rgyun ma ste /
T02D3272:24b-14: kha dog ser mo 'bras kyi snye ma mdzes pa'i
T02D3272:24b-15: grungs pa phyag na bsnams pa dang mchog sbyin par
T02D3272:24b-16: mdzad pa / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing gnod
T02D3272:24b-17: sbyin mo brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba la 'di
T02D3272:24b-18: mdzad pa / lta ste / bzad mo dang shin tu bzad mo dang /
T02D3272:24b-24: zla ba dga' ma rnams kyis te /
T02D3272:24b-25: de dag rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'i lha mo yin no //
T02D3272:24b-26: de'i bha ga'i dbus su yi ge dzam las bdag nyid dpal mgon po dzambha la ste /
T02D3272:24b-27: sku mdog ser po autpala sngon po'i phreng bas brgyan pa /
T02D3272:24b-28: dbu rgyan la sangs rgyas lnga bzhugs pa /
T02D3272:24b-29: phyag g-yas pas sa bon gyi shing thog g-yon pas ne'u le bsnams pa /
T02D3272:24b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa lngas kyang rin po che la
T02D3272:24b-31: sogs pa'i char rab tu 'bebs par mdzad pa dang
T02D3272:24b-32: / zhabs gnyis kyis dung gi kha rgyan can dang
T02D3272:24b-33: padma'i kha rgyan can gyi gter chen po las kyang
T02D3272:24b-34: rin po che la sogs pa'i char rab tu 'bab
T02D3272:24b-35: par 'gyur bar rang gi khyim gyi sa phyogs su
T02D3272:24b-36: legs par bsam par bya ba'o //
T02D3272:24b-37: nor rgyun ma dang 'khril ba'i byang chub kyi sems
T02D3272:24b-38: rnam par 'thor ba las yang dag par byung ba'i
T02D3272:24b-39: rin po che'i phung pos nam mkha' ma lus pa
T02D3272:24b-40: khyab par gyur par rnam par bsgom par bya ba'o
T02D3272:24b-41: // mgrin pa'i dus na ni gang ba bzang po kha dog mthing nag shar gyi phyogs su'o //
T02D3272:24b-42: rnam thos kha dog ser po ni lho phyogs su'o //
T02D3272:24b-43: nor sbyin kha dog dmar po ni nub phyogs su'o //
T02D3272:25a-1: kha dog ser po ni byang phyogs su'o //
T02D3272:25a-2: me mtshams su rnam par bkra ba'i rna gdub can kha dog dmar po'o //
T02D3272:25a-3: bden bral du ni phreng ba can mthing nag go //
T02D3272:25a-4: rlung du ni dbang po'i mchog kha dog ser po'o //
T02D3272:25a-5: dbang ldan du ni kha'i dbang phyug ser po'o //
T02D3272:25a-6: de dag rnams thams cad kyang gnod sbyin mo'i bha ga la gnas pa ste /
T02D3272:25a-7: rin po che'i char rab tu 'bebs par gyur pas
T02D3272:25a-8: dzambha la dang 'dra bar bsgom par bya ba yin
T02D3272:25a-9: no // shar gyi sgor ni nor sbyin gcig bu
T02D3272:25a-10: spa ba 'phyang bar gyur pa rin po che'i char
T02D3272:25a-12: lho'i sgor ni padma dang padma chen po gnyis so //
T02D3272:25a-13: nub kyi sgor ni bzhad gad pa dang bzhad gad chen po gnyis so //
T02D3272:25a-14: byang gi sgor ni gdab dang legs par gang ba gnyis te /
T02D3272:25a-15: de dag rnams kyang gcer bu sba ba 'phyang ba'o //
T02D3272:25a-16: mgon po dzambha la dang rjes su mthun pas sngags
T02D3272:25a-17: kyis yi ge dgod pa la sogs pa bya ste
T02D3272:25a-20: bha dang la ni dpung pa gnyis la'o //
T02D3272:25a-23: dr'a dang ya ni brla gnyis la'o //
T02D3272:25a-24: sv'a dang h'a ni pus mo gnyis la'o //
T02D3272:25a-25: nor bu bzang po spyi bor gnas //
T02D3272:25a-26: mig gnyis la ni rnam thos so //
T02D3272:25a-27: de bzhin kha dbang kha legs gnas //
T02D3272:25a-28: nu ma'i bar du gang ba bzang //
T02D3272:25a-29: gnod sbyin nor sbyin lte bar ro //
T02D3272:25a-30: bzhad gad phreng ldan brla gnyis la //
T02D3272:25a-31: rnam bkra rna gdub rkang gnyis la //
T02D3272:25a-32: dbang mchog yan lag kun la dgod //
T02D3272:25a-33: mgon po dzambha la rang gi bdag nyid kho na
T02D3272:25a-34: bsgom pa'i yi ge bzang po rnams dgod pa ni
T02D3272:25a-38: sa mgo bo'i lhag par dgod par bya ba'o //
T02D3272:25a-39: lha dang yi ge rnams kyi lag pa'i yang dbang po rnams la ba shad par bya ste //
T02D3272:25a-41: dzlum ni lag pa'i mthil du'o //
T02D3272:25a-42: tslum ni sor mo thams cad kyi rtse mo la'o //
T02D3272:25a-43: sam ni sor mo thams cad kyi rtsa ba la'o //
T02D3272:25a-44: aom dzambha la dza lendra ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3272:25a-45: zhes bya ba 'di rab tu gnas par bya ba'o //
T02D3272:25a-46: mdzub mo la ni nor bu bzang po'o //
T02D3272:25a-47: gang ba bzang po ni gung mo la'o //
T02D3272:25a-48: srin lag la ni nor sbyin no //
T02D3272:25a-49: mthe'u chung la ni rnam thos te /
T02D3272:25a-50: de bzhin du kha'i dbang phyug ni lag pa'i mkhur ba la'o//
T02D3272:25b-0: @25b mkhrig mgul du bzhad gad kyi phreng ba can no //
T02D3272:25b-1: mthe bong la ni rnam par bkra ba'i rnag dub can no //
T02D3272:25b-2: mthe bong dang mdzub mo gnyis kyi bar du ni dbang po'i mchog go //
T02D3272:25b-3: lag pa'i mthil du ni dzambha la dza lendra'o //
T02D3272:25b-4: rdo rje'i chu la sogs pa'i bdud rtsi lnga 'am //
T02D3272:25b-5: de dag med par gyur na rdo rje'i chus kyang ste /
T02D3272:25b-6: chu dang bsres la khyor bas 'thungs te /
T02D3272:25b-7: thun tshod gsum du khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3272:25b-8: dus mi ring ba nyid la 'di dzambha la dang 'dra bar 'gyur te /
T02D3272:25b-9: nor dang gser phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D3272:25b-10: sa gzhi rdzas kyi gang bar byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D3272:25b-11: aom dzlum tslum sa:zhes brjod la khyor bas dbul bar bya ba'o //
T02D3272:25b-12: grub par ma gyur na ni bdag nyid dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad du bsgoms te /
T02D3272:25b-13: dzambhu la'i sku gzugs dug dang skye tshe dang shing
T02D3272:25b-14: ni ma pa'i 'dab ma dang thad phrom dang dur
T02D3272:25b-15: khrod kyi sol bas legs par byugs la bsro zhing
T02D3272:25b-16: bskam par bya'o // phyi nas ni khros par gyur
T02D3272:25b-17: pas dur khrod kyi me la 'de bar bya ste
T02D3272:25b-19: dpal dzambha la'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
